pullrequest.title: add support for keyboard teleop the hands

content.raw:
I wonder if we want to put the hand control in a separate script, perhaps in the `val_grasping` repository? That would relieve some of the keyboard pressure.

An alternative is to add the `val_grasping` controller to `srcsim`, but it is closer to a reference controller and is not required, while the ihmc walking and arm controllers are required.
content.html:
I wonder if we want to put the hand control in a separate script, perhaps in the val_grasping repository? That would relieve some of the keyboard pressure.

An alternative is to add the val_grasping controller to srcsim, but it is closer to a reference controller and is not required, while the ihmc walking and arm controllers are required.
